messages.message:
<!subteam^SQ3KR3V17> planning to do a lunch & learn about Flow & Flow Execution next Wednesday.  It will be a presentation similar to Instabase Architecture.  It will be high-level overview of how flow works.  Please let us know if there is something in particular you'd want us to focus on.

@dlluncor
I have heard that there are Flow parameters of some sort? That would be great to hear more about! As well as post-flow features?
I would love to hear about Flow Parameters as well :stuck_out_tongue:

+1 — also not sure if the focus is meant to be on architecture or an overview of practical features, and I would find it really useful to go over some of the *“hidden” features and strategies people have used for POCs*. Might be better suited to a lunch & learn dedicated to that topic than flow (even though a few of them are hidden in flow)

Even seemingly simple strategies like @Anant’s way of sending just a text file into a flow as input and side-loading the rest of the data for the Galileo POC are extremely useful and not always obvious :blush:
+1 quick overview of current limitations and plans for the same.
